scripts.build: cd web && npm run build && cd ../api && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd web && npm run dev" "cd api && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd web && npm run start" "cd api && npm run start"
scripts.lint: cd web && npm run lint && cd ../api && npm run lint
scripts.check-types: cd web && npm run check-types && cd ../api && npm run check-types
